nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军
中国人民解放军东北军区空军司令部
中国人民解放军东北军区空军部
中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军司令部
en: People's Liberation Army Shenyang Military Region Air Force

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军空军驻沈阳军区的战役军团，归空军建制，受空军和沈阳军区双重领导。负责领导和指挥驻辽宁、吉林、黑龙江及内蒙古东部地区空军部队。
description.en: The former operational corps of the People's Liberation Army Air Force stationed in the Shenyang Military Region, under the establishment of the Air Force and dual leadership of the Air Force and the Shenyang Military Region. It was responsible for leading and commanding air force units stationed in Liaoning, Jilin, Heilongjiang, and eastern Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的空军兵种。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区
en: People's Liberation Army Shenyang Military Region

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国东北地区设立的一个大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army, located in Northeast China.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的省会，中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军机关驻地。
description.en: The capital city of Liaoning Province, China, and the headquarters of the PLA Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事领导机关。
description.en: The highest national military command and control organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 原沈阳军区的防空军部队，后与沈阳军区空军合并。
description.en: The former air defense force of the Shenyang Military Region, which later merged with the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 1950年代初，中国人民志愿军为援助朝鲜、保卫国家安全而进行的一场战争。
description.en: A war fought in the early 1950s by the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to aid North Korea and defend national security.

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝战争中由中华人民共和国派出的“志愿”军队。
description.en: The 'volunteer' army deployed by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝战争中与中国人民志愿军和朝鲜人民军作战的多国部队。
description.en: The multinational military force that fought against the Chinese People's Volunteer Army and the Korean People's Army during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 美国的空军力量。
description.en: The air service branch of the United States Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军空军飞行员，一级战斗英雄，在抗美援朝战争中击毙美国空军“王牌驾驶员”G.A.戴维斯。
description.en: A pilot of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army Air Force, a first-class combat hero, who shot down and killed American ace pilot George Andrew Davis Jr. during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 美国空军“王牌驾驶员”，在抗美援朝战争中被张积慧击毙。
description.en: An American ace pilot in the USAF, killed in action by Zhang Jihui during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军空军飞行员，二级战斗英雄，在抗美援朝战争中击落美国空军“双料王牌驾驶员”H.E.费席尔的飞机。
description.en: A pilot of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army Air Force, a second-class combat hero, who shot down the aircraft of American double ace pilot Harold E. Fischer during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 美国空军“双料王牌驾驶员”，其飞机在抗美援朝战争中被韩德彩击落。
description.en: An American double ace pilot in the USAF, whose aircraft was shot down by Han Decai during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军空军的轰炸机部队，曾两次轰炸大和岛。
description.en: A bomber division of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army Air Force, which conducted two bombing raids on Daehwa-do island.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜西海岸的一个岛屿，在抗美援朝战争期间曾被志愿军空军轰炸。
description.en: An island off the west coast of Korea, which was bombed by the Chinese Volunteer Army Air Force during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的空中军事力量。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the Republic of China Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军飞行员，曾在福建轮战中击落台湾中华民国空军飞机。
description.en: A PLA Air Force pilot who shot down aircraft of the Republic of China Air Force during rotational duty in Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军飞行员，首次击落美国无人驾驶高空侦察机。
description.en: A PLA Air Force pilot who achieved the first-ever shootdown of a U.S. unmanned high-altitude reconnaissance drone.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国，一个北美洲的国家。
description.en: The United States of America, a country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任东北军区空军司令部及沈阳军区空军司令员。
description.en: A general of the PLA, served as the commander of the Northeast Military Region Air Force Command and the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任沈阳军区空军司令员。
description.en: An admiral of the PLA, served as the commander of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任沈阳军区空军司令员和政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, served as the commander and political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任沈阳军区空军司令员和副司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, served as the commander and deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任沈阳军区空军司令员和参谋长。
description.en: A general of the PLA, served as the commander and chief of staff of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任沈阳军区空军司令员和副司令员。
description.en: An general of the PLAAF, served as the commander and deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副司令员兼空军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region and commander of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副司令员兼空军司令员、副司令员、参谋长、副参谋长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region and commander of its air force, as well as deputy commander, chief of staff, and deputy chief of staff of the air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任沈阳军区副司令员兼空军司令员。
description.en: An general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region and commander of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任中共中央政治局委员、中央军委副主席，曾任沈阳军区副司令员兼空军司令员。
description.en: An general of the PLAAF, former member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He previously served as the deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region and commander of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副司令员兼空军司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region and commander of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任沈阳军区副司令员兼空军司令员。
description.en: An general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region and commander of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员。
description.en: A major general of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员和副政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA, served as the political commissar and deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，毛泽东的侄子，曾兼任沈阳军区空军政治委员。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, nephew of Mao Zedong, who concurrently served as the political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员和副政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA, served as the political commissar and deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员。
description.en: A general of the PLA, served as the political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员和副司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the political commissar and deputy commander of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员、副政治委员和政治部主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the political commissar, deputy political commissar, and director of the political department of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区空军政治委员和副政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the political commissar and deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副政治委员兼空军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region and political commissar of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副政治委员兼空军政治委员、空军副政治委员和纪委书记。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region and political commissar of its air force, as well as deputy political commissar and secretary of the discipline inspection commission of the air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副政治委员兼空军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region and political commissar of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军中将，曾任沈阳军区副政治委员兼空军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLAAF, served as the deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region and political commissar of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任沈阳军区副政治委员兼空军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the PLA, served as the deputy political commissar of the Shenyang Military Region and political commissar of its air force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军上将，曾任沈阳军区空军参谋长。
description.en: An general of the PLAAF, served as the chief of staff of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国防事务的部门。
description.en: The department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for national defense affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的一个航空兵师，其领导班子曾受到中央军委通报表扬。
description.en: An aviation division of the PLA Air Force, whose leadership was commended by the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 被中华人民共和国国防部授予荣誉称号的雷达站。
description.en: A radar station awarded an honorary title by the Ministry of National Defense of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 被中国人民解放军空军授予荣誉称号的单位。
description.en: A unit awarded an honorary title by the PLA Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 被中央军委授予“全心全意为人民服务的好干部”荣誉称号的个人。
description.en: An individual awarded the honorary title of 'Good Cadre Who Serves the People Wholeheartedly' by the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 被中国人民解放军空军授予“一级战斗英雄”荣誉称号的个人。
description.en: An individual awarded the honorary title of 'First-Class Combat Hero' by the PLA Air Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军

description.zh-cn: 1950年7月13日，中央军委决定成立中国人民解放军东北军区空军司令部，即沈阳军区空军的前身。
description.en: On July 13, 1950, the Central Military Commission decided to establish the PLA Northeast Military Region Air Force Command, the predecessor of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军空军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军归中国人民解放军空军建制。
description.en: The PLA Shenyang Military Region Air Force was under the establishment of the PLA Air Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军受中国人民解放军沈阳军区领导。
description.en: The PLA Shenyang Military Region Air Force was under the leadership of the PLA Shenyang Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军

description.zh-cn: 1957年5月25日，沈阳军区防空军与沈阳军区空军合并。
description.en: On May 25, 1957, the Shenyang Military Region Air Defense Force merged with the Shenyang Military Region Air Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军
relationships.target: 抗美援朝战争

description.zh-cn: 沈阳军区空军机关及部分部队参加了抗美援朝战争。
description.en: The headquarters and some units of the Shenyang Military Region Air Force participated in the Korean War.

relationships.target: 联合国军

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝战争中，中国人民志愿军空军击落以美军为首的联合国军飞机229架、击伤72架。
description.en: During the Korean War, the Chinese People's Volunteer Army Air Force shot down 229 and damaged 72 aircraft of the United Nations Command, which was led by the US military.

relationships.target: G.A.戴维斯

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝战争中，张积慧击毙了美国空军“王牌驾驶员”G.A.戴维斯。
description.en: During the Korean War, Zhang Jihui shot down and killed American ace pilot George Andrew Davis Jr.

relationships.target: H.E.费席尔

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝战争中，韩德彩击落了美国空军“双料王牌驾驶员”H.E.费席尔所驾的飞机。
description.en: During the Korean War, Han Decai shot down the aircraft piloted by American double ace pilot Harold E. Fischer.

relationships.target: 大和岛

description.zh-cn: 在抗美援朝战争中，空军第八师两次出动飞机轰炸大和岛。
description.en: During the Korean War, the 8th Air Division dispatched aircraft twice to bomb Daehwa-do island.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军
relationships.target: 中华民国空军

description.zh-cn: 在国土防空作战中，沈阳军区空军部队多次击落台湾中华民国空军侵入大陆侦察、袭扰的飞机。
description.en: In homeland air defense operations, the Shenyang Military Region Air Force units shot down aircraft of the Taiwan's Republic of China Air Force that intruded into the mainland for reconnaissance and harassment on multiple occasions.

relationships.target: 中华民国空军

description.zh-cn: 在福建轮战中，击落台湾中华民国空军F-86型飞机2架、击伤1架。
description.en: During rotational duty in Fujian, shot down two and damaged one F-86 aircraft of the Taiwan's Republic of China Air Force.

relationships.target: 美国

description.zh-cn: 首次击落美国无人驾驶高空侦察机。
description.en: Achieved the first-ever shootdown of a U.S. unmanned high-altitude reconnaissance drone.

中国人民解放军沈阳军区空军
空军航空兵第一师

description.zh-cn: 中央军委对空军航空兵第一师领导班子进行通报表扬。
description.en: The Central Military Commission issued a circular to commend the leadership of the 1st Air Division.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国防部
relationships.target: 红色前哨雷达站

description.zh-cn: 国防部授予“红色前哨雷达站”荣誉称号。
description.en: The Ministry of National Defense conferred the honorary title of 'Red Outpost Radar Station'.

relationships.target: 神炮中队

description.zh-cn: 空军授予“神炮中队”荣誉称号。
description.en: The Air Force conferred the honorary title of 'Divine Artillery Squadron'.

relationships.target: 范生文

description.zh-cn: 中央军委授予范生文“全心全意为人民服务的好干部”荣誉称号。
description.en: The Central Military Commission conferred upon Fan Shengwen the honorary title of 'Good Cadre Who Serves the People Wholeheartedly'.

relationships.target: 赵宝桐

description.zh-cn: 空军授予赵宝桐“一级战斗英雄”荣誉称号。
description.en: The Air Force conferred upon Zhao Baotong the honorary title of 'First-Class Combat Hero'.
